name: Adventurezator: When Pigs Fly
description: The Adventurezator is an emergent adventure game about creating emergent adventure games! When Pigs Fly is our adventure campaign of courage, intrigue, and betrayal (and dumbness) - created using the Adventurezator itself!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 250, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 2.2Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 6850, or better with at least 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

reviews.review_text: Fun adventure game with great potential thanks to the ability to make and share your own adventures. The pig has to solve different point&click puzzles while avoiding the enemies which walk around on their personal time schedule in his quest to become a boring human.   6/7 dwarves
Really enjoyed playing the game, the breaking of the fourth wall and the jokes got me. Looking forward to play more.
Its not a game, its a pile of garbage.
